defaultValue.value:
Hi {{queries.tooljetdbGetTicketDetails.data.customer_name}}
Thanks for contacting us.
We're working on ticket #{{queries.tooljetdbGetTicketDetails.data.id}}, and will let you know once we have an update.

Thanks and regards
B R A N D

events.message: Failed to add contact! Please check and try again.

options.subject: {{`Update on ticket #${queries.tooljetdbGetTicketDetails.data.id} - B R A N D`}}

events.message: {{`Failed to send mail to ${queries.tooljetdbGetTicketDetails.data.customer_email}! Please check and try again`}}

options.from_name: {{`${globals.currentUser.firstName} ${globals.currentUser.lastName} from B R A N D`}}
options.subject: {{queries.tooljetdbGetTicketDetails.data.assigned_to != components.textinput1.value ? `New Ticket #${queries.tooljetdbGetTicketDetails.data.id} assigned - B R A N D` : `Ticket #${queries.tooljetdbGetTicketDetails.data.id} updated - B R A N D`}}
options.htmlContent:
Hi
{{queries.tooljetdbGetTicketDetails.data.assigned_to != components.textinput1.value ? `A new ticket has been assigned to you.` : `A ticket assigned to you has been updated.`}}

Ticket Details:
ID: #{{queries.tooljetdbGetTicketDetails.data.id}}
Status: {{components.dropdown1.selectedOptionLabel}}
Priority: {{components.dropdown2.selectedOptionLabel}}
Product version: {{queries.tooljetdbGetTicketDetails.data.product_version}}
Issue type: {{queries.tooljetdbGetTicketDetails.data.issue_type}}
Description: {{queries.tooljetdbGetTicketDetails.data.description}}

Thanks and regards
B R A N D
